EmailTemplate.subject: Skip The Office Sniffles
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Skip-The-Sniffles/_/N-ehm?cmp=EBFGCOLDFLU19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Cold & Flu Season Is Coming! Remember to stock up to fight the spread of office germs. <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Breakroom/_/N-eh3?cmp=EBFGCOLDFLU19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Breakroom Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Breakroom/_/N-eh3?cmp=EBFGCOLDFLU19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Tissues-and-hand-sanitizer/_/N-eh4?cmp=EBFGCOLDFLU19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Tissue & Hand Sanitizers Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Tissues-and-hand-sanitizer/_/N-eh4?cmp=EBFGCOLDFLU19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Shop All <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Skip-The-Sniffles/_/N-ehm?cmp=EBFGCOLDFLU19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> grandandtoy.com/gov <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/gov]]>
